name: Robo's Savory Jalapeno Mozzarella Cheese Cookies
author: Love2Cook
summary: A very quick and super-tasty alternative to your everyday bread. Use pretzel dough instead of pizza dough for harder cookies and breadstick dough for chewier cookies with a softer middle. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated pizza dough, separated into 8 portions
1 large jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
3 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Separate minced jalapeno pepper into 8 portions; press each dough round into 1 portion jalapeno pepper so that peppers are imbedded in one side of the dough
Place dough, pepper-side up, on a baking sheet
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the top of each dough round and top with salt
Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through and cheese is melted, 12 to 15 minutes
